original_text: Make thee two trumpets of silver; of a whole piece shalt thou make them: that thou mayest use them for the calling of the assembly, and for the journeying of the camps.
korean_text: 은 나팔 둘을 만들되 두들겨 만들어서 그것으로 회중을 소집하며 진영을 출발하게 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Make thee two trumpets of silver
of a whole piece shalt thou make them
that thou mayest use them for the calling of the assembly
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그것들을 총회를 부르기 위해 사용하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and for the journeying of the camps
